attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Legalised abortion degrades the medical profession. It offers expectant mothers a hideous choice- the choice of killing a baby.Many women say it is the only choice they are offered. Abortion allows irresponsible men to shirk their duty,but it causes great distress to men who care about their unborn child.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
